def new_invariant(s):
    """
    An attempt to estimate average shortest path length based on graph features.
    This formula combines the number of nodes, average degree, and transitivity.
    """
    n = s['n']
    avg_degree = s['avg_degree']
    transitivity = s['transitivity']

    return n / (1 + avg_degree * (1 - transitivity))
